string_table.string: Guys, am I the only dumbass, or did nobody else get it? What was it even about? // changed 'only one dumb here' to 'only dumbass here' to better reflect rough bandit tone, 'is everyone else didn't get it' to 'did nobody else get it' to better flow / 'nobody' for more informal tone, replaced ',' after 'get it' to '?' to better tone
Well, you're a geezer! You could have told me about Stirlitz! // 'mould' to 'geezer' to better reflect 'old joker'. replaced ',' after geezer with '!' to better flow
Ha-ha. Funny. A real knee-slapper. // 'I just can't' to 'that's a real knee-slapper' to reinforce sarcasm
Mn, really gets to the soul... // replaced 'ugh' with 'mn' to reinforce contemplative tone, added 'the' before 'soul' for emphasis, ellipsis after 'soul' to further reinforce contemplative tone
Yeah, Cupcake. If you played like that in prison, you'd be fucked long ago. // removed 'the' before 'prison' and replaced 'have been' with 'be' to reinforce bandit colloquial tone
That oughtta make waterfalls.. // idk what 'forestfall' means. if it's to evoke sadness, then i replaced the whole statement to reflect that

We didn't have any shit to play on when we were in juvie. // im assumming he meant he was in prison as a kid, replaced with us-central slang for juvenile-detention called 'juvie.' open to edits on this to make it less us-centric

No, no, no! That's not it, not an inch! No, you're kidding! // replaced ',' after last 'no' in trio for emphasis and edited capitalized subsequent 'that' to make seperate clause, replaced ',' after inch with '!' to reinforce tone, capitalized 'no' subsequently for seperate clause. contracted 'you' and 'are' to reinforce bandit colloquial tone.

No, no - well.. guys, wait. I clearly didn't get it, that was a song? Fuck that music! // replaced ',' after second 'no' to '-', replaced ',' after 'well' with ellipsis, replaced ',' after wait with '.' to better convey pause. replaced 'music' with song' in first instance to better differentiate dislike this particular song. replaced 'it' with 'that' before 'song' to better convey that the songs not still occuring in conversation
Gha-ga-ga-ga-gaaa-ha-ha-haha-ha! good one Knuckles, really, I swear! // removed ',' before 'pal' to better flow, replaced 'pal' with 'knuckles' to better convey rough-and-tumble, positive nickname

string.text: Ha ha ha! No, you're a pure comedian, really!

string_table.string: Gha-gag-agha-gA-gah, bad boy, heck - a real bad-boy! // changed 'demon' to 'bad-boy' to reinforce rough-and-tumble tone

string.text: I'm laughing my ass off, guys! Haaaa-hahahahaha-haaa-haa!
